summary: Sint Maarten is a small country in the Caribbean, part of the Kingdom of the Netherlands. It shares an island with the French territory of Saint Martin. With a population of around 58,000, it's one of the Dutch Caribbean islands. The capital is Philipsburg. Before 2010, it was known as the Island Territory of Sint Maarten. In 2017, Hurricane Irma caused extensive damage to the island.
title: Sint Maarten
